replies.body: WHERE ARE NEW KAYN SKINS ? {{champion:141}}

Kayn?? Aurelion Sol is long forgotten.
Xayah and Rakan have three skins each as well 10/10
well what about what about {{champion:6}} or {{champion:112}} and the most forgotten champ {{champion:421}}  ?

Exactly.. Forgotten.
League prefers to spam skins for the popular champions, and so Rumble hasn't had a skin for years until recently. He deserves at least two more by the next 365 days.
League makes more money that way.

Aurelion is hard to make skins for, there's so much more that goes into developing a skin for him than most champions and lot more that can go wrong because of the nature of his models and textures, and this is of course beyond all the usual QA and dev processes that go into a skin.

Xayah and Rakan were perfect thematically for valentine's skins, and the Championship skins are on a separate schedule so don't really count from that perspective.
Forget Valentines day skins, we need BeeKled ASAP
When release kayn before zoe. JustriotThings

I think we can all agree that Zoe is a very good fit for a Pool Party skin, while Kayn isn't so much. The PP skins are planned long in advance because they release new ones every year. You don't have to determine a skin concept because one already exists, you just have to pick champions that fit, so it's a shorter process.
What about Taliyah? Literally a perfect fit

The selection for the SSG skins would have been before dev started for the Pool Party skins most likely. While the Championship winners skins are largely on a different schedule, and won't exclude a champion from receiving another skin, it is still something to consider. 

I'd argue that Zoe is a better fit for Pool Party, and given that Taliyah would be receiving a skin around the same time, even if one not limited by the typical schedules, it's not surprising she didn't get one this round.
And what about Kled, he has been there for ages and yet only has one skin which is not even that nice. And this stupid disney champ Zoe gets a second skin in such a short period of time. :(
Finna wait for Christmas for Candy Kayn
{{champion:103}} When are we gonna see Ahri in a swimsuit! From what I've seen in other backgrounds, she wheres a one-piece.
Pool Party Aurelion is superior
As much as I'd love a Pool Party Ahri, she already has a lot of really good skins with great variety. I think some other champs are going to be much higher priority.
and they still was able too squeeze beemo into the pick gj riot {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
gotta admit, thought you were lying and trolling me but he is there. Love it
Pool party Yorick!!! Commmmmeeeee oonnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnn already... {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
So with these "position orbs", can they actually be earned in-game or are they strictly from purchases?

Hmm, normally they would go the token route and you'd be able to get one or two orbs for free but there's nothing in the missions to suggest that, so it seems perhaps you can only purchase them with RP this time around. Time will tell for sure I guess, but maybe they just wanted to try something a bit different? It does seem a bit strange that they'd give you possible skin shards for free in other events, but make these champ only orbs purchase only.

It's cold outside, there's no kind of atmosphere...

STOP ASKING FOR SKINS, RUMBLE ALREADY HAS SUPER GALAXY AND *NEW* BADLAND BARON, IF YOU WOULD REMOTELY CHECK YOURSELF YOU WOULD KNOW THERE IS A AURELION SOL SKIN NEXT PATCH. KAYN ALREADY GOT A LEGENDARY SKINS AND URGOT GOT ALL SKIN FREE REMADE, VIKTOR GOT THE DEATHSWORN IF YOU WERE A TRUE VIKTOR OTP YOU WOULD HAVE IT ALREADY. REKSAI? DON'T GO THERE - SHES BROKEN FOR TOO LONG.
@RIOT I don't think Caitlyn is Graves... *In the bundle bit for Graves
graves? thats gp xd
zzz always the same champions that get skins. actually funny how boring these skins are.
Why aren't Swain, Vladimir, and Heimer not in the Adc Position orbs? What is this?

no one think this is the worst pool party skin flash art ever?
to be honest, compare to the flash art before, the quality did change...
( don't fight, just want to discuss about this question)
wheres da bard's skins at????????{{champion:432}}
{{champion:427}} Are u kidding 2 years ago D; When will he get a new skin?
In Steampunk culture they take water guns and paint them for a 'metal and gears' look. Caitlin's gun is the other way round.
GP bundle is cheaper if you own Caitlyn apparently...go figure!

OfA is back YES!
Pool Party Taric chromas YES!
why is beemo in the full splash XD

640 RP each.... For essentially a chroma of a ward?
Thats more than a chroma for a skin?

No thanks.

They might not (in fact I think it's likely) have the framework in place to make ward skin chromas, given the gold championship one was a completely separate ward you didn't have to own the original for despite the skin which followed the same rules being a chroma. I think in this case it's a "we wanted to give some different colour options, just buy the one you like best", which I can respect well enough.

error: "Pool Party Gangplank Bundle - Grillmaster Edition
3011 RP (3406 RP if you need Caitlyn)"
